original_title: Creating a Different Image: Portrait of Alile Sharon Larkin
overview: A jubilant affirmation of self-identity, Creating a Different Image is Alile Sharon Larkin in her own words defiantly declaring, "I am an artist."  Learn more about the personal life and professional aspirations of the filmmaker behind Your Children Come Back to You (1979), A Different Image (1982), Dreadlocks and the Three Bears (1991) and many more.  â€”Samuel B. Prime
title: Creating a Different Image: Portrait of Alile Sharon Larkin
